name: Effective Dates and Sunset Clauses
description: Temporal reasoning about start/end dates of rules

theory.natural_language: Policy P becomes effective on 1 March and sunsets on 30 September. Before 1 March it is not in force. After 30 September it no longer applies. Today is 15 June. Query asks about 1 October as well.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Today is between the effective date and sunset date.

queries.natural_language: Was Policy P in force on 20 February?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. It was not yet effective before 1 March.

queries.natural_language: Will Policy P apply on 1 October?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. It sunsets on 30 September, so it does not apply on 1 October.
